title: Too Weird for Pity

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: First off, let's toss out the pity idea. I don't feel sorry for you. Or for me. We're both way too weirdly constructed for that.
dialogue.context: Rejecting pity in favor of awe at complexity
